head.title: Angel Hair with Tomatoes, Basil and Garlic

ing.item: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

directions.step:
Prepare pasta according to package directions; drain. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook for one minute. Add tomatoes, basil, salt and pepper. Cook for 3 minutes. Add hot pasta to skillet; toss well. Add chicken broth and stir. Toss with Parmesan cheese and serve immediately. Pasta Home Page, 30 minute Recipes.
NOTES : Serves 6 to 8.
